N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.4 - Services

State Regulations
(a) The director
shall make written determinations of the needs of youth assigned to a day
placement program and shall, to the extent resources are available, arrange for
the delivery of services to meet those needs. Such services shall include: (1)
education, as required by the New York

State Education Law; (2)
parent
counseling; (3)
recreation; (4)
behavior
management; (5)
assistance in
obtaining medical services; and
(6)
assistance in providing mental health services. (b) Such services may include: (1)
educational skills assistance; (2)
drug/alcohol treatment; (3)
vocational training; (4)
life skills training for youth and their
parents; (5)
community service; and
(6)
other services consistent
with the needs of the youth. Notes
